p: The EM-DAT Database, containing 21,000 events is divided into natural catastrophes containing disaster subgroups of geophysical, meteorological, hydrological, climatological, and extra-terrestrial as well as technical accidents containing disaster subgroups of industrial, transportation, and miscellaneous accidents. Data are organized by cost (adjusted to the 2014 US dollar) and year. The raw data have been extracted and plotted in a frequency-stacked histogram shown in Fig.Â 1.
